title: Can't upgrade ros-melodic-ros1-ign to 0.4.4 and ros1-ign-bridge to 0.4.0.

content.raw:
I am not able to update ros-melodic-ros1-ign to version 0.4.4 as shown in the [system requirements](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/system_requirements). Also, is ros1-ign-bridge still being used? Otherwise it doesn’t update to 0.4.0 either.

I used

`sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y`

And still get the versions below:

overlord@venture:~/subt\_docker$ dpkg -l | grep ros1  
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign 0.4.0-2bionic   
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge 0.4.0-2bionic   
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign-gazebo-demos 0.4.0-2bionic   
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign-point-cloud 0.4.0-2bionic   
ii ros1-ign-bridge 0.3.0-1~bionic
content.html:
I am not able to update ros-melodic-ros1-ign to version 0.4.4 as shown in the system requirements. Also, is ros1-ign-bridge still being used? Otherwise it doesn’t update to 0.4.0 either.

I used

sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y

And still get the versions below:

overlord@venture:~/subt_docker$ dpkg -l | grep ros1
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign 0.4.0-2bionic
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign-bridge 0.4.0-2bionic
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign-gazebo-demos 0.4.0-2bionic
ii ros-melodic-ros1-ign-point-cloud 0.4.0-2bionic
ii ros1-ign-bridge 0.3.0-1~bionic
